title: J. R. R. Tolkien "The Lord of the Rings"
description: In ancient times the Rings of Power were crafted by the Elven-smiths, and Sauron, the Dark Lord, forged the One Ring, filling it with his own power so that he could rule all others.

title: J.R.R. Tolkien "The Hobbit"
description: The journey through Middle-earth begins here with J.R.R. Tolkien's classic prelude to his Lord of the Rings trilogy.
